mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTICE( NOTICE_NO , NOTICE_TITLE , NOTICE_CONTENT , NOTICE_IMAGE1 , NOTICE_IMAGE2, NOTICE_REGDATE, NOTICE_COUNT, USER_ID) VALUES ( seq_notice_notice_no.nextval , #{noticeTitle:VARCHAR}, #{noticeContent:VARCHAR}, #{noticeImage1:VARCHAR}, #{noticeImage2:VARCHAR}, SYSDATE, #{noticeCount}, #{userId.userId:VARCHAR} )
mapper.select: SELECT N.NOTICE_NO , N.NOTICE_TITLE , N.NOTICE_CONTENT , N.NOTICE_IMAGE1 , N.NOTICE_IMAGE2, N.NOTICE_REGDATE, N.NOTICE_COUNT, U.USER_ID, U.NICKNAME FROM NOTICE N , USERS U WHERE n.notice_no = #{notice_no} AND U.USER_ID = N.USER_ID AND U.USER_ID = 'admin01'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT inner_table.* , ROWNUM AS row_seq FROM ( SELECT N.NOTICE_NO , N.NOTICE_TITLE , U.USER_ID, U.NICKNAME , N.NOTICE_REGDATE, N.NOTICE_COUNT, N.NOTICE_IMAGE1, N.NOTICE_IMAGE2 FROM NOTICE N , USERS U WHERE N.USER_ID = 'admin01' AND U.USER_ID = N.USER_ID
AND LOWER(NOTICE_NO) LIKE LOWER('%${search.searchKeyword}%')
AND LOWER(NOTICE_TITLE) LIKE LOWER('%${search.searchKeyword}%')
ORDER BY NOTICE_NO DESC) inner_table WHERE ROWNUM <= #{search.endRowNum} ) WHERE row_seq BETWEEN #{search.startRowNum} AND #{search.endRowNum}
